DOC.brief_title: Study ACT-129968 Adult Patients With Partly Controlled Asthma .
DOC.criteria: Males female age 18 65 year Presenting diagnosis asthma accord GINA Guidelines Prebronchodilator force expiratory volume one second ( FEV1 ) < / = 85 % patient 's predict normal value Reversibility airway obstruction > / = 12 % > / = 200mL prebronchodilator FEV1 ACQ score > / = 1.5 History lifethreatening asthma Any asthma exacerbation require treatment systemic corticosteroid within last 3 month Ongoing recent treatment medication allergic airway disease Smoking within last year , lifetime consumption > / = 10 packyears ( e.g. , 20 cigarettes/day 10 year ) History chronic pulmonary disease ( asthma ) , chronic obstructive pulmonary disease ( COPD ) , fibrosis , tuberculosis sarcoidosis
